item.title: About
item.description: I don’t do prose well. My brain just doesn’t work that way. I reason things out by building prototypes. Contact me through email at hello@wilber.co.ke You can download my latest resume here. For my complete and unabridged experience, please visit my LinkedIn

item.title: Projects
item.description: Oneoak Focus on solving core human problems. We support companies and founders with an ambitious vision to disrupt industries and improve people's lives through technology. We are looking for new opportunities in the healthcare and technology sector Link (broken)：invest.oneoak PharmOnMobile Link (broken)：pom Assembli Link (broken)：assembli.africa Wavelogic Wavelogic is a technology consulting company that helps Kenyan business owners stay on the cusp of modern day technology.
